GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.4.231
GSD.description:
trace_events_hist: add check for return value of 'create_hist_field'

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.231 by commit 31b2414abeaa6de0490e85164badc6dcb1bb8ec9, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 30350d65ac5676c6d08d4fc935bc9a9cb0fd4ed3. For more details please see the references link.
